content.description: The crux is coming over the roof onto the bomber pebbles.  Start low, head up and left through the overhang.  You can't miss the huge pebble on the upper part of the wall.  It is a fun problem.
content.protection: Landing is a little slanted.  Bring a pad and a spotter.
content.location: Go into the back entrance of Castlewood and park at The Falls Trailhead.  Walk into the canyon as if headed towards the orange boulder, past the waterfall until the trail splits off to the left.  Find a place to cross the stream, and once on the hill, hike north (direction you came from) until you come to the Local's Boulder.  Dr Love's is just up the hill 25 yards or so from here.

pathTokens: Denver Metropolitan Area Bouldering and Buildering
